title: Ingest Metrics from Multiple Sources into Prometheus with OTel Collector
author: Sharad Regoti
description: Learn to use OTel Collector as a central hub to ingest and process metrics from varied sources and send them to Prometheus for unified observability.
cntitle: 使用 OTel Collector 将来自多个来源的指标提取到 Prometheus 中
cndescription: 学习使用 OTel Collector 作为一个中心枢纽，从各种来源提取和处理指标，并将它们发送到 Prometheus 以实现统一的 可观测性。
